name: Carmen
text: It's a beautiful little oasis to relax and enjoy the hospitality of the very kind staff. We were on our honeymoon and the hostess welcomed us with some rose petals on our bed, which was so thoughtful :) we stayed only one night, but we could use the jacuzzi, enjoy a massage and have dinner in oriental style (which we all booked pretty last minute). The rooms are beautifully decorated in Arabian themes, we stayed in the red Algerian room. Big plus: huge tv with Netflix in the rooms. We loved our stay here! Free parking on the street. We had no trouble finding a spot.

name: Milan
text: - Beautiful rooms - We could leave our bikes in the garden - Great shower & bed - Quiet - Clean - Kind host - Free parking spot for the car in front of the hotel

name: Simon
text: An amazing oasis in the middle of a residential area! The furnishings and decoration are chock-full of character and the whole place was peaceful and comfortable. Our host Kamil was charming and ready to help at all times.

name: Emily
text: Had the best over night stay here, absolutely amazing interior, with the most wonderful hosts who were so attentive and made a delicious breakfast! The white room was stunning and was very clean. Definitely will be returning again :)

name: Sue
text: Individuality. Very different to anywhere else I’ve stayed. Bedroom and en-suite very comfortable. Warm welcome

name: Qin
text: We didn't take the breakfast in the hotel, as we planned a Brunch in a restaurant. But as we know, the café, the tea ant some snacks are for free! Furthermore, the hotel is very beautiful, there are not many rooms, and it's quite quiet. We had a very good experience there!

name: Julie
text: Beautiful decor, comfortable bed, friendly and helpful staff, absolutely loved this place and will be back

name: Steven
text: very nice and clean rooms, friendly + helpful personnel

name: Ronald
text: Absolutely unique and very inviting. So many nice touches!

name: Marco
text: Great hospitality from Camel, the guy in charge of everything
